sys_ui_page.description: This UI Page will be used to remove all the objects linked to an Assessment.
sys_ui_page.html:
var tableName = RP.getWindowProperties().table_name; var currentSysId = RP.getWindowProperties().current_sys_id; var bodyMsg = new CIRAssmtModel().GetRemoveAssessmentMessage(tableName, currentSysId);

${bodyMsg}
sys_ui_page.name: remove_assessment_objects
